verses.t: And{G1161} in{G1722} those{G3778} days{G3588}, when the number{G4129} of the disciples{G3588} was multiplied{G4129}, there arose{G1096} a murmuring{G1112} of the Grecians{G3588} against{G4314} the Hebrews{G1445}, because{G3754} their{G846} widows{G3588} were neglected{G3865} in{G1722} the daily{G2522} ministration{G3588}.when the number?

Then{G1161} the twelve{G1427} called{G4341} the multitude{G3588} of the disciples{G3588} unto them, and{G1161} said{G2036}, It is{G2076} not{G3756} reason{G701} that{G2641} we{G2248} should leave{G2641} the word{G3588} of God{G3588}, and serve{G1247} tables{G5132}.

Wherefore{G3767}, brethren{G80}, look ye out{G1980} among you{G5216}seven{G2033} men{G435} of{G1537} honest report{G3140}, full{G4134} of the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} and{G2532} wisdom{G4678}, whom{G3739} we may appoint{G2525} over{G1909} this{G3778} business{G3588}.
But{G1161} we{G2249} will give ourselves continually{G4342} to prayer{G3588}, and{G2532} to the ministry{G3588} of the word{G3588}.

And{G2532} the saying{G3588} pleased{G700} the whole{G3956} multitude{G3588}: and{G2532} they chose{G1586} Stephen{G4736}, a man{G435} full{G4134} of faith{G4102} and{G2532} of the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151}, and{G2532} Philip{G5376}, and{G2532} Prochorus{G4402}, and{G2532} Nicanor{G3527}, and{G2532} Timon{G5096}, and{G2532} Parmenas{G3937}, and{G2532} Nicolas{G3532} a proselyte{G4339} of Antioch{G491}:
Whom{G3739} they set{G2476} before{G1799} the apostles{G3588}: and{G2532} when they had prayed{G4336}, they laid{G2007} their hands{G3588} on them{G846}.

And{G2532} the word{G3588} of God{G3588} increased{G837}; and{G2532} the number{G3588} of the disciples{G3588} multiplied{G4129} in{G1722} Jerusalem{G2419} greatly{G4970}; and{G5037} a{G3793} great{G4183} company{G3793} of the priests{G3588} were obedient{G5219} to the faith{G3588}.
And{G1161} Stephen{G4736}, full{G4134} of faith{G4102} and{G2532} power{G1411}, did{G4160} great{G3173} wonders{G5059} and{G2532} miracles{G4592} among{G1722} the people{G3588}.

Then{G1161} there arose{G450} certain{G5100} of{G1537} the synagogue{G3588}, which{G3588} is called{G3004} the synagogue of the Libertines{G3032}, and{G2532} Cyrenians{G2956}, and{G2532} Alexandrians{G221}, and{G2532} of{G575} them{G3588} of Cilicia{G2791} and{G2532} of Asia{G773}, disputing{G4802} with Stephen{G3588}.
And{G2532} they were{G2480} not{G3756} able{G2480} to resist{G436} the wisdom{G3588} and{G2532} the spirit{G3588} by which{G3739} he spake{G2980}.
Then{G5119} they suborned{G5260} men{G435}, which said{G3004}, We have heard{G191} him{G846} speak{G2980} blasphemous{G989} words{G4487} against{G1519} Moses{G3475}, and{G2532} against God{G3588}.

And{G5037} they stirred up{G4787} the people{G3588}, and{G2532} the elders{G4245}, and{G2532} the scribes{G3588}, and{G2532} came upon{G2186} him, and{G2532} caught{G4884} him{G846}, and{G2532} brought{G71} him to{G1519} the council{G3588},

And{G5037} set up{G2476} false{G5571} witnesses{G3144}, which said{G3004}, This{G3778} man{G3588} ceaseth{G3973} not{G3756} to speak{G2980} blasphemous{G989} words{G4487} against{G2596} this{G5127} holy{G40} place{G3588}, and{G2532} the law{G3588}:

For{G1063} we have heard{G191} him{G846} say{G3004}, that{G3754} this{G3778} Jesus{G2424} of Nazareth{G3588} shall destroy{G2647} this{G5126} place{G3588}, and{G2532} shall change{G236} the customs{G3588} which{G3739} Moses{G3475} delivered{G3860} us{G2254}.

And{G2532} all{G537} that sat{G2516} in{G1722} the council{G3588}, looking stedfastly{G816} on{G1519} him{G846}, saw{G1492} his{G846} face{G3588} as it had been{G5616} the face{G4383} of an angel{G32}.
